== Introduction ==

The purpose of this page is to deal with the potential security issue introduced with erroneous translations from language packs, as described <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-translators/2009-January/002048.html|here]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-translators/2009-January/002036.html|here]]</nowiki>.
